data.name: Warface - Rifleman Tournament Pack
data.detailed_description:
All a rifleman could ask for for the toughest of battles. This gear set consists of a four-piece armor and an outstanding assault rifle. These items can boast unique stats designed with PvP players’ needs in mind.



Contains the following items:
  • Rifleman Open Cup helmet - Decreases flash bang effect by 70%. Increases head protection by 20%.
  • Open Cup shoes - Increases speed while sprinting by 5%. Increases sprint distance by 50%. Delays claymore activation by 3 sec.
  • Open Cup gloves - Increases accuracy by 10% and weapon selection/deselection speed by 20%.
  • Open Cup vest - Increases weapon reloading speed by 10%, provides 40% explosive protection, 20% melee damage protection and 10 pt absorption.
  • MS Radek - The MS Radek is a modular weapon from the Polish Military Technical Academy. MS stands for “Modułowy Systema" – modular system. The MS Radek remains comfortable to control even after long bursts, it's a weapon that's destined to become a staple of every self-respecting Rifleman's gun cabinet.



You can obtain two in-game achievements for 10000 and 25000 kills with this assault rifle.



All Champion’s gear is permanent and is permitted in official tournaments. Put this on and be ready for any tricks your enemy might have up their sleeves! Be ready and sharp for anything the enemy might throw at you!

The MS Radek remains comfortable to control even after long bursts, it's a weapon that's destined to become a staple of every self-respecting Rifleman's gun cabinet.

data.short_description: Contains the full Champion’s rifleman gear and the assault rifle MS Radek, both are permanent. This gear set is designed to deliver the best performance possible, possesses unique class-specific buffs. Put it on and don’t let anything hold you back from diving into the heat of battle!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
